text: 12|64|keat( yea k kau b) ban tb tha  tae aoy yeung touk chetd puok eng  champoh ke( poun yea min) dauchdel yeung ban touk chetd puok eng champoh bng  robsa ke( you so hv) pimoun ryy?  bo nde a l laoh chea anak theroksaa da brasaer  bamphot .  haey trong chea anak anet sraleanh cheangke bamphot .
